channel.title: What Is the KDF? on Kubernetes Development Framework (KDF)
channel.description: Recent content in What Is the KDF? on Kubernetes Development Framework (KDF)

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Select your Operating System: osx  win10  $('document').ready(function(){ toggleOnloadFunction("os", "osx", ["osx","win10"]); }); function toggleOnloadFunction(itemGroup, itemDefault, itemList) { for (i of itemList) { if (i == itemDefault) { $("[item-group='"+itemGroup+"'][item='"+i+"']").show(); $("[item-group='"+itemGroup+"'][item='"+i+"-button']").css("background-color", "PaleGreen") } else { $("[item-group='"+itemGroup+"'][item='"+i+"']").hide(); $("[item-group='"+itemGroup+"'][item='"+i+"-button']").css("background-color", "") } } } function toggleButtonFunction(itemGroup, itemDefault, itemList, itemName) { for (i of itemList) { if (i == itemName) { $("[item-group='"+itemGroup+"'][item='"+i+"']").show(); $("[item-group='"+itemGroup+"'][item='"+i+"-button']").css("background-color", "PaleGreen") } else { $("[item-group='"+itemGroup+"'][item='"+i+"']").hide(); $("[item-group='"+itemGroup+"'][item='"+i+"-button']").css("background-color", "") } } } The kdk repository may be used to create a docker container with all of the tools that one would typically use in order to develop and operate kubernetes clusters.
